document_data.name: Dur-baagal
document_data.mainbody: '''Dur-baagal''' was one of the [[primordial]]s who fought against the [[god]]s before the [[Tearfall|Sundering]] of [[Abeir-Toril]].
document_data.History: At the [[Dawn War|dawn of time]], Dur-baagal opposed the gods and was killed by [[Auril]].{{Cite dragon/367/Hall of the Frostmaiden|61}}
document_data.Legacy: The throne room of Auril's Winter's Hall, the Lyceum, was crafted from the still beating heart of Dur-baagal.
